title: Deployment
description: A signal deployment to a specific destination platform with activation status and key

type.description: Discriminator indicating this is a platform-based deployment

is_live.description: Whether signal is currently active on this destination

activation_key.description: The key to use for targeting. Only present if is_live=true AND requester has access to this destination.

estimated_activation_duration_minutes.description: Estimated time to activate if not live, or to complete activation if in progress

type.description: Discriminator indicating this is an agent URL-based deployment

is_live.description: Whether signal is currently active on this destination

activation_key.description: The key to use for targeting. Only present if is_live=true AND requester has access to this destination.

estimated_activation_duration_minutes.description: Estimated time to activate if not live, or to complete activation if in progress
